name: Block And Dash
description:
Block and Dash

A jam game built for a theme "Hide or get caught". I tried to interpret the theme in a way that will not be boring, but fast paced! Somehow reminds of hockey... 

Don't get catched by a black hole - hide behind blocks you create. 
Reach the highest score!

Your highscore is not being saved anywhere - when you quit the page, it's forgot, so screenshot or remember it.

Controls described in game.

Made by Filip Novotny (Quadratic Games) for Trijam #123.

Premade assets:
Some sfx from freesound.org, two my old songs and one Godot Engine
